page.title: 14Entertainment
page.content: Held in Village Hut or Village Dance Hall. {Beetle Drive. }Monthly, entertainment for about 30 people both young and old. {Whist Drive. } Supported mainly by elderly section of population. {Discos. } Occasionallly held bringing teenagers from far afield. {Folk Dance.} Held occasionallly in the summer months. Sometimes held in the village square, particularly at festival time. { Music Festival. } Proving very popular. Incluseds choirs, solo instrumentalists and poetry readings. Guest artists are booked. Usually held in the Church with audiences up to 200. {Bingo. }Fortnightly. Held in Deane Close Community Centre.
